0.2.name: wordpress/unofficial-twitter-widget
0.2.description: Allows simple integration between your sidebar widgets and the official twitter widget ** THIS WIDGET WILL STOP WORKING AFTER MAY 7TH 2013 ** This is when Twitter stop unauthenticated calls to their API, and block the old widgets. https://dev.twitter.com/blog/api-v1-retirement-final-dates This plugin won't support the new Twitter Widget. For more information about them please visit: https://twitter.com/settings/widgets
